definition: thymine nucleotide (T, pairs with adenine A 腺嘌呤 in DNA)

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To prepare praziquantel implants and investigate the in vitro drug release.
sentences.chinese: 目的製備胸腺五肽微球並對其體外釋放進行考察。

sentences.english: Then they timed the reactions that caused the new thymine bonds to form.
sentences.chinese: 然後他們記錄了產生新的胸腺嘧啶鍵形成的反應。

sentences.english: The lymphoblasts in thymus possess membrane ALPase activity.
sentences.chinese: 胸腺內淋巴母細胞具有膜性ALP。

sentences.english: You talk about the thymus gland revivifying over the course of a couple of generations.
sentences.chinese: 你們談到胸腺復活超過一大代人結合的過程。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the curative effect of thymus peptide as a supplementary cure in the retreatment of serious pulmonary tuberculosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察復治重症肺結核採用胸腺肽輔助治療的療效。

sentences.english: In 2006, she had a thymectomy for thymoma.
sentences.chinese: 此患者於2006年因患胸腺瘤而接受胸腺切除術。

sentences.english: It may be used to clinic. In comparison with cow thymosin, the main characteristic was the same.
sentences.chinese: 與小牛胸腺素比較，其主要特性基本相同。

sentences.english: The discovery of immunological function of thymus is truly a landmark in the history of immunology.
sentences.chinese: 胸腺功能的發現是免疫學史上一個里程碑式的事件。

sentences.english: These results showed that the involution of thymus could be induced by diabetes.
sentences.chinese: 以上結果提示，糖尿病可誘導胸腺退化。

sentences.english: Part of the involutive thymus was replaced by myoid cells.
sentences.chinese: 一部分胸腺組織已被肌樣細胞代替。

sentences.english: Objective To improve CT diagnosis and different diagnosis of thymic uncommon disorders.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高對胸腺少見疾病的CT診斷及鑑別診斷。

sentences.english: Interleukin1 activity was measured by mouse thymocyte proliferation assay.
sentences.chinese: 白細胞介素1活性採用小鼠胸腺細胞增殖法測定。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effect of thymosin on pediatric viral myocarditis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討胸腺肽治療小兒病毒性心肌炎的療效。

sentences.english: ETP cells retained the ability to become either T cells or myeloid cells.
sentences.chinese: 早期胸腺祖細胞同時保留成爲T細胞或髓細胞能力。

sentences.english: Sheet radiates with thymus cure cannot alleviate anaemic .
sentences.chinese: 單用胸腺放射治療不能緩解貧血。

sentences.english: Objective To assess the distribution and clinical significance of B-lymphocyte subgroup CD20 in patients with myasthenia gravis.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解胸腺內B淋巴細胞與重症肌無力發生的關係。

definition: endocrine gland/gland producing internal secretion, e.g. hormone
